inclusion.criterion: mmol/l or 1h or 2h glucose values during OGTT < fasting glucose
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Diabetes mellitus, impaired glucose tolerance, other reason for reactive hypoglycaemia
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has symptoms of dizziness and severe diarrhea, with a lab study showing V. cholerae in stool specimen.
